data.actual_result: It keeps closing, meaning you have to do it multiple times.
data.expected_result: The destination screen stays open, letting you send it first time.
data.short_description: When sharing a server link from the server to DMs, the discord share screen closes when you change the link’s destination.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server and select “Invite Members” - Share Link- Select Discord
